body: I actually don't mind this kind of ntr too much. At least she isn't making the mc look like a fool and he is willingly letting it happen.
Also "Hinamix" and "Love to Like" have the same school uniforms, but "Itaiamai" has a different uniform from all of his other series, so there probably won't be any cameos there.

@Hilihkinthil917392 Sadly not, Rosa just cameod here as a joke and to show "Hinamix" is in the same universe as "Love to Like." Kinda just makes me think all of Ryoh-Zoh's works can take place in the same universe.
Damn you author, I thought Tennouji Rosa will enter the battlefield. Nevertheless, good stuff is good stuff. Waiting for the next chapter.
Good stuff, good stuff. Thanks @xevry for the translation. It's great to finally get to read and understand this one. I just looked at the artwork before.
@codevine he's kinda a bit of both he's a Chad with a cuckhold fetish long hair guy was the only one to creampie her tbf he did the same so it's mutual
@AnchiraWantMyBanana cuckold and chad two words in a very different category that can never line up together lmao
To be fair this is not quite "NTR" as the main characters are totally ok with this, these are just of horny teens doing stupid shit they will regret later on in life
Oh sweet a teaser of what awaits in Itaiamai's later chapters
@Captain Netorare Mei gets more focus soon. She’s in like every other chapter starting from chapter 9.
this is definitely not going on the list bahahhaggg
Girl with short black hair it's hotter should focused more on her...hmmm this gets a 4/10.
I'm also concerned about itaiamai, damn I don't want the fl in itaiamai to have sex with someone else, this author is giving me anxiety
